doc.repnme: Hygiene promotion in Ethipia : lessons from a WaterAid supported project
doc.abstracts: This Field Note descries experiences in hygiene promotion in the Oromia Regio of Ethiopia. Three water projects, funded by WaterAid, have also implemented hygiene and sanitation promotion approach which use a variety of channels of communication (Village Hygiene Communicators, Water and Sanitation Committees, Focus Groups, and District Health Staff) no pass key messages. Promotional methodologies include: demonstration latrines, use of participatory tools and practices, media campaigns, school visits, house-to-house visits, and child-to-child hygiene promotion. The Note presents advice and recommendations on the basis of this field experience regarding the use of these approaches for large-scale programs.
doc.docna: Hygiene promotion in Ethipia : lessons from a WaterAid supported project
